subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Some of the best rink builders and icemakers in North America have been working around the clock to stage the N.H.L.’s first outdoor game in the United States, which will take place on New Year’s Day.
snippet: Some of the best rink builders and icemakers in North America have been working around the clock to stage the N.H.L.’s first outdoor game in the United States, which will take place on New Year’s Day.
